00006 /* Uncomment the following #define if you want to use this
00007    memorycontroller module or define it with -D for compiler.
00008  */
00009 /* #define MEMORYCONTROLLER */
00010 
00011 /* Uncomment the following #define if you want to exit when out of
00012    memory occurs. Otherwise 'allocateb' and 'reallocateb' return NULL in
00013    the case of failure.
00014    Note: You need to define MEMORYCONTROLLER if you want to use this.
00015  */
00016 /* #define EXIT_OUTOFMEMORY */
00017 
00018 /* Uncomment the following line if you want to use "Amount Control".
00019    Note:You need to define MEMORYCONTROLLER if you want to use this.
00020  */
00021 /* #define AMOUNTCONTROL */
00022 
00023 /* Uncomment the following line if you want to perform thorough checks
00024    on memory.
00025    Note: You need to define MEMORYCONTROLLER and AMOUNTCONTROL if you
00026    want to use this.
00027  */
00028 /* #define CHECKMEMORYDEALLOCATIONS */

00030 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------- */
00031 
00032 #if defined(MEMORYCONTROLLER)
00033 
00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 
00036 /* Do NOT use these five functions directly!
00037    Instead, use macros allocateb, deallocateb etc.
00038 */
00039 void* allocatememory(size_t nbytes, char* file, int line);
00040 void  deallocatememory(void* block, char* file, int line);
00041 void* reallocatememory(void* block, size_t nbytes, char* file, int line);
00042 int   checkmemoryconsistency(char* file, int line);  /* Returns -1 if problems (and outputs an error message), 0 otherwise. */
00043 void  outputmemoryreport(char* file, int line);
00044 
00045 #define allocateb(nbytes)          allocatememory(nbytes,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00046 #define deallocateb(block)         deallocatememory(block,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00047 #define reallocateb(block,nbytes)  reallocatememory(block,nbytes,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00048 #define checkconsistency()        checkmemoryconsistency(__FILE__,__LINE__)
00049 #define memoryreport()            outputmemoryreport(__FILE__,__LINE__)
00050 
00051 /* Use 'checkmemory' at end of main to check that all memory is
00052    released. Returns -1 if problems (and outputs an error message),
00053    0 otherwise. */
00054 int   checkmemory(void);
00055 
00056 /* Information retrieval. */
00057 unsigned long maxusedmemory(void);       /* In bytes. */
00058 unsigned long currentlyusedmemory(void); /* In bytes. */
00059 unsigned long nallocations(void);        /* Number of allocation calls. */
00060 unsigned long ndeallocations(void);      /* Number of deallocation calls. */
00061 
00062 #else /* ! defined(MEMORYCONTROLLER) */
00063 
00064 #include <stdlib.h>
00065 
00066 #define allocateb(nbytes)          malloc(nbytes)
00067 #define deallocateb(block)         free(block)
00068 #define reallocateb(block,nbytes)  realloc(block,nbytes)
00069 #define checkconsistency()
00070 #define memoryreport()
00071 
00072 #define checkmemory()
00073 
00074 #define maxusedmemory();
00075 #define currentlyusedmemory();
00076 #define nallocations();
00077 #define ndeallocations();
00078 
00079 #endif /* defined(MEMORYCONTROLLER) */
